item.title: Protocol 2023-W48: Base Building
item.description:
ğŸ“… Weekly Schedule

Day Type Workout
Friday Run 4 miles at Zone 2 (HR <150)
Saturday Brick + Content Creation 30-minute bike + 20-minute run, followed by 1 hour of content creation (Twitter thread or blog post)
Sunday Long Run 6 miles at Zone 2 (HR <150)

ğŸ¯ Training Goals

  • Build a solid aerobic base in swimming and cycling
  • Maintain running endurance while transitioning to triathlon
  • Preserve strength PRs (300 lb deadlift, 225 lb squat)

ğŸš€ Startup Goals

  • Complete core features for MVP
  • Begin beta testing with 5 users
  • Document progress and lessons learned in a blog post

item.title: Protocol 2023-W40: Base Building
item.description:
ğŸ“… Weekly Schedule

Day Type Workout
Monday Recovery Rest day or light stretching/yoga
Tuesday Strength Full body workout (see template below)
Wednesday Bike 60min indoor trainer, focus on form and cadence (85-95rpm)
Thursday Swim 800m technique drills (400m kickboard, 400m drills)
Friday Strength Full body workout (see template below)
Saturday Brick 30min bike + 20min run, practice transitions, light intensity
Sunday Long Run 6mi easy pace (HR <150)

Full Body Workout Template

Exercise Sets Reps Weight (lbs)
Close grip bench press 3 7 115
Cable seated row 3 10 130
Barbell shoulder press 3 7 85
Assisted pull up 3 2 50
Dumbbell lying tricep extension 3 8 20
Dumbbell incline curl 3 7 20
Walking lunges 3 7 20
Lying leg curl 3 9 125

ğŸ¯ Training Goals

  • Swim 800m with proper technique
  • Bike 60min with consistent cadence
  • Run 6mi at Zone 2 intensity
  • Maintain full body strength with 2x/week workouts

ğŸš€ Startup Goals

  • Launch MVP with core features by January 2026
  • Acquire 10 beta users by February 2026
  • Generate first $1 in revenue by February 2026

ğŸ“Š Weekly Targets

Cardio Volume:

item.title: Protocol 2023-W01: Base Building
item.description:
ğŸ“… Weekly Schedule

Day Type Workout
Monday Recovery Rest or light stretching/yoga (30 min)
Tuesday Strength Full body workout (see template below)
Wednesday Bike 30 min bike + 20 min run + content creation session (1 hour)
Thursday Swim 800m swim with technique drills (focus on breathing and form)
Friday Strength Full body workout (see template below)
Saturday Brick 60 min indoor trainer, focus on cadence (85-95 RPM)
Sunday Long Run 6 miles easy run (HR <150)

Full Body Workout Template

Exercise Sets Reps Weight (lbs)
Close grip bench press 3 7 115
Cable seated row 3 10 130
Barbell shoulder press 3 7 85
Assisted pull up 3 2 50
Dumbbell lying tricep extension 3 8 20
Dumbbell incline curl 3 7 20
Walking lunges 3 7 20
Lying leg curl 3 9 125

ğŸ¯ Training Goals

  • Establish a consistent swim routine focusing on technique
  • Build a solid cycling base with proper form and cadence
  • Maintain running endurance without increasing intensity
  • Maintain full body strength with 2x/week workouts

ğŸš€ Startup Goals

  • Complete core features of MVP by January 2026
  • Acquire 10 beta users by February 2026
  • Generate first $1 in revenue by February 2026

ğŸ“Š Weekly Targets

Cardio Volume:

Habit Configuration

Edit the habits list above to customize your daily tracking. Each habit needs:

  • id: A unique identifier (used internally for streak tracking)
  • name: The display name shown in your daily log

These habits will appear as checkboxes in your daily logs. Check them off as you complete them.

ğŸ§  AI AGENT INSTRUCTIONS

Hi agent! Your job is to help me live the best version of my life. This repository contains the logs of my days in simple text format.

Mission

Help me plan my weeks and days as a top 0.01% individual who excels across multiple domains simultaneously: triathlon training, startup building, ML/AI engineering, and content creation.

Current Focus

Primary: Triathlon training (swim/bike/run) while maintaining strength Secondary: Launch startup MVP + create content to dogfood the product
